homepage.heroRole: Full‑stack developer & Creator of numerical experiments
homepage.heroSubtitle1: Here are some of my projects and achievements.
homepage.partThreeText: Explore additional work, experiments, and open-source contributions.
homepage.gameParagraph: Gluttony Eater is a game built with Unreal Engine 5 where you play a fighter who eats various foods to unlock contextual superpowers. Each food grants a temporary bonus — from explosive dashes to iron-stomach shields — encouraging creative combos and resource management.
homepage.gameBullet1: Eat to power up and time your snacks wisely.
homepage.gameBullet2: Situational skills based on food types (movement, defense, explosion).
homepage.gameBullet3: Arcade spirit, modern visuals, and responsive controls.
